long_description: The versatile SOL Sport Utility blanket is up for nearly any task. It can be used as an emergency blanket one day and a ground tarp for your tent the next. Rugged material stands up to many different outdoor tasks-from hauling heavy loads to covering gear in bad weather. 6 grommets come in handy when setting up the blanket as a shelter. Material reflects 95% of your body heat back to you to keep you warm; bright orange exterior makes you easy to spot. SOL Sport Utility blanket measures 7 x 5 ft. and packs down small for easy transportation.
short_description: The versatile SOL Sport Utility blanket is up for nearly any task. It can be used as an emergency blanket one day and a ground tarp for your tent the next.
